employments.title: Data Engineer
highlights: Onboarded new customer by coordinating with client IT staff to set up automated raw data extraction and scripting ETL pipeline in Airflow DAG

Shortened customer onboarding timeline from 12 to 4 weeks by designing, implementing, and maintaining web app module that allowed client IT staff to independently verify raw data schema and data extraction script and reduced manual email exchanges between client IT and product managers

Reduced data error incidents and increased deployment confidence by provisioning sandboxed environment that mirrored production infrastructure and configuration and enabled developers to perform end-to-end testing on ETL logic for individual git branches.
Increased production Airflow availability and reliability by introducing DataDog for monitoring outage, notifying on-call engineers, and idenifying abnormal performance slowdown.
Experimented with fault-injection testing on production Airflow and trained teammates on responding to production outage through simulated Airflow failures

projects.title: Chives exchange
highlights: Electronic stock exchange with horizontally scalable order matching engines and Flask-powered web UI

projects.title: PyArchive
highlights: Hybrid file backup solution resilient against network failure

projects.title: InquireUSCIS
highlights: Query large number of USCIS application statuses using multi-threaded workers each driving a headless Chrome session

projects.title: Simple resume generator
highlights: Laid out with HTML Flexbox and stylized using Materialize CSS
Generated from JSON using vanilla JavaScript
